thread.title: Utley takeout slide key; Dodgers beat Mets 5-2, tie NLDS 1-1 (Yahoo Sports)
thread.title_full: Utley takeout slide key; Dodgers beat Mets 5-2, tie NLDS 1-1 (Yahoo Sports)

author: ASFN Admin
title: Utley takeout slide key; Dodgers beat Mets 5-2, tie NLDS 1-1 (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,191 Utley takeout slide key; Dodgers beat Mets 5-2, tie NLDS 1-1 (Yahoo Sports) Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada broke his right leg when a takeout slide by Chase Utley flipped the shortstop during a four-run rally in the seventh inning, and the Los Angeles Dodgers went on to beat New York 5-2 Saturday night to tie their NL Division Series at one game apiece. The Mets were leading 2-1 when the Dodgers put runners at the corners with one out against Noah Syndergaard. Second baseman Daniel Murphy flipped to Tejada, who took the throw awkwardly for an apparent force as Utley slid past the bag and slammed into him with Tejada's back turned to the play, causing him to flip over as the tying run scored from third.
